messages.content:
Detect all motorcyclists in the image and return their locations in the form of coordinates. The format of output should be like {"bbox_2d": [x1, y1, x2, y2], "label": "motorcyclist", "sub_label": "wearing helmat" # or "not wearing helmat"}.
![image](https://qianwen-res.oss-accelerate-overseas.aliyuncs.com/Qwen2.5-VL/gronding_box_safety_draw.png)

```json
[
	{"bbox_2d": [341, 258, 397, 360], "label": "motorcyclist", "sub_label": "not wearing helmat "},
	{"bbox_2d": [212, 332, 274, 448], "label": "motorcyclist", "sub_label": "not wearing helmat "},
	{"bbox_2d": [66, 124, 112, 198], "label": "motorcyclist", "sub_label": "not wearing helmat "},
	{"bbox_2d": [5, 235, 63, 320], "label": "motorcyclist", "sub_label": "wearing helmat "}
]
```
